import { useContext } from 'react' import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, } from 'recharts' import MyTitle from '../../../../Components/MyTitle/MyTitle' import { Context } from '../../../../context' import './chart.scss' const data = [ { day: 'Mon', completed: 2 }, { day: 'Tue', completed: 5 }, { day: 'Wed', completed: 7 }, { day: 'Thu', completed: 3 }, { day: 'Fri', completed: 8 }, { day: 'Sat', completed: 4 }, { day: 'Sun', completed: 9 }, ] const Chart = () => { const { darkMode } = useContext(Context) const chartStyles = { height: 300, tooltip: { cursor: { stroke: 'red', strokeWidth: 2 }, }, line: { type: 'natural', dataKey: 'completed', strokeWidth: 3, activeDot: { strokeWidth: 2, r: 10, }, isAnimationActive: true, stroke: '#29A19C', }, } if (window.matchMedia('(max-width: 1600px)').matches) { chartStyles.height = 170 } return (
Progress chart
) } export default Chart
